gameDetails.name: Amerigo Queenie 2: Cove Island, Bay Island & New Progress Tokens
gameDetails.description: Amerigo Queenie 2: Cove Island, Bay Island & New Progress Tokens, a mini-expansion for Amerigo, consists of additional components that can be mixed with those in the base game. The cove island tile has many small island pieces with a large central waterway, while the bay island tile has a massive block of land that will almost certainly create a large island in the playing area. The six progress tokens add new abilities that players can gain during the game, such as the ability to ignore the pirates once or to take a second action at the end of a round.
